code: import React from"react";import"./style.css";function CharacterCard(props){return React.createElement("div",{className:"card col-4",key:props.id},React.createElement("button",{className:"button",value:props.name,onClick:function onClick(e){props.clickValue(e);props.shuffle();props.score();}},React.createElement("img",{name:props.name,alt:props.name,src:props.image,width:"100",height:"100"})));}export default CharacterCard;
